TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Larepaq, title = Larepaq, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Larepaq} }

S.FORM: = Larepaq = Gaga mniq Taytung Tajnsyang ka alang Larepaq. 126 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 326 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 99% niqan 324 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 1% niqan 2 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Paiwan96%, Amis1%, Truku1%, ni rahuq na o2%. Hangan alang alang Ra-ri-pa. Pnseanak alang Alang seejiq thnganan dxgal nii kiya ni ksun alang " mniq dxgal hini" msa. Nniqan Tay-tung-seyn Da-jen-syang tay-pang-cun. Llbangan Ga daya Ta-cu-kaw-si nyusang Tay-pang-si ga babaw qsiya sduman hiya, hraan hidaw Tay- ma-ri na Tow-ryang-cun, mlutuc gqiyan hidaw ni Tu-pang-cun, hunac ni Ta-wu-syang sipaw alang Ay-kwo-pu, daya ga lupun Ping-maw-cun. Pgkla ppanan rulu Mgriq rulu: Tduwa muda paah Tay-cyo-seyn Nan- hwey-kung-ru mquri hraan hidaw 68 seyn mtmay dgiyaq, kika qtaun kingal sapah ptasan, riqi narac 68-1 seyn mquri Tay-pang ni alang Ra-ri-pa. Mlutuc teyn-c ti-tu Teyn-c ti-tu alang. Klgan seejiq alang Pay-wan-cu. Skari kari kari Pay-wan, kari Tlu. Snhiyan cung-cyaw Ci-tu-cyaw, Teyn-cu-cyaw. Pnyahan alang Dxgal nii pusu niqan kghak nniqan dalang, yasa sblaiyq na kndusan, kndudul maa dha dalang da, kika Tay-pang-se-cyu ni Ra-ri-pa ka sayang. Pgkla rgrigan kwan-kwang Qtaan bnatas "Tay-tung-seyn-s"- Pnatas Pay-wan-cu ni Ru-kay. Ta-jen-syang-kung-syo Hwa-tung-se-hwey-cyaw-cyu-kwang

= Larepaq = Gaga mniq Taytong Tajnsyang ka alang Larepaq. 126 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 326 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 99% niqan 324 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 1% niqan 2 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Paiwan96%, Amis1%, Troko1%, ni rahoq na o2%. Hangan alang alang Ra-ri-pa. Pnseanak alang Alang seejiq thnganan dxgal nii kiya ni kson alang " mniq dxgal hini" msa. Nniqan Tay-tong-seyn Da-jen-syang tay-pang-con. Llbangan Ga daya Ta-co-kaw-si nyosang Tay-pang-si ga babaw qsiya sdoman hiya, hraan hidaw Tay- ma-ri na Tow-ryang-con, mlotoc gqiyan hidaw ni To-pang-con, honac ni Ta-wo-syang sipaw alang Ay-kwo-po, daya ga lopon Ping-maw-con. Pgkla ppanan rolo Mgriq rolo: Tdowa moda paah Tay-cyo-seyn Nan- hwey-kong-ro mqori hraan hidaw 68 seyn mtmay dgiyaq, kika qtaon kingal sapah ptasan, riqi narac 68-1 seyn mqori Tay-pang ni alang Ra-ri-pa. Mlotoc teyn-c ti-to Teyn-c ti-to alang. Klgan seejiq alang Pay-wan-co. Skari kari kari Pay-wan, kari Tlo. Snhiyan cong-cyaw Ci-to-cyaw, Teyn-co-cyaw. Pnyahan alang Dxgal nii poso niqan kghak nniqan dalang, yasa sblaiyq na kndosan, kndodol maa dha dalang da, kika Tay-pang-se-cyo ni Ra-ri-pa ka sayang. Pgkla rgrigan kwan-kwang Qtaan bnatas "Tay-tong-seyn-s"- Pnatas Pay-wan-co ni Ro-kay. Ta-jen-syang-kong-syo Hwa-tong-se-hwey-cyaw-cyo-kwang
